titleStmt.title: The souls warfare comically digested into scenes, acted between the soul and her enemies vvherein she cometh off victrix with an angelical plaudit.
Divine comedian
titleStmt.author: Tuke, Richard, fl. 1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S.G. for Allen Bancks ...,

notesStmt.note: Issued same year with title: The divine comedian, or, The right use of plays, improved, in a sacred tragy-comaedy / by Rich. Tuke. London : Printed by S.G. for A. Bancks, 1672.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
